title: cafter
author: cafter
content: I want to know the merit history of user @colinisthemanjust randomly i was reading a thread where i seen his profile to capture and post hereThen I clicked on his/her merit history there was not earned merit in last 120days, Because he/she mostly post on altcoin boards.I checked try ninja's website, LoyceV's website, And Bpip.org. I didn't got a single thread or single reply of @colinistheman which was merited. I think I don't know the way from which we can know about old merited threads.

comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: You can get all the details of any user by visiting bpip.org. Just search the username of the individual and the merit history will be displayed along side other details such as merits sent and to who, top merits received and from who, merits earned in last 30 days, 60 days, 90 days and 120 days. Other information like ranks, trustline etc are also there.I guess the reason you cannot see much about the merit history of the user is because the merits were earned beyond 120 days or probably airdropped

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: That account in question has not earned a single merit, all the merits were airdropped I guess that’s why you were unable to see any history when you used Loyce.club and bpip.org.Another user that also helps in merit statistics is DdmrDdmr, so you could use his merit dashboard[1] to check if you can also use it to analyze data of users (I actually haven’t used it before so there’s nothing much I can say about it, but I’m sure you’ll be able to figure it out on your own.)[1] https://public.tableau.com/app/profile/ddmrddmr/viz/BitcointalkMeritDashboard/PersonalSummary
